item.title: core dump
item.description: core dump 定位分析 core dump 日志分析 core.212160 ###1、定位core发生的位置： gdb /export/servers/model/crf/so_lib/libCRFPP.so core.212160 (gdb) bt #6 <signal handler called> #7 0x00007f269c2a34be in CRFPP::TaggerImpl::forwardbackward() () from /tmp/crfpp-java-0.57-fcac54dc-13d1-48a4-b76d-b2941f15da0d-libCRFPP.so #8 0x00007f269c2aad92 in CRFPP::TaggerImpl::parse() () from /tmp/crfpp-java-0.57-fcac54dc-13d1-48a4-b76d-b2941f15da0d-libCRFPP.so #9 0x00007f269c2a18f0 in Java_org_chasen_crfpp_CRFPPJNI_Tagger_1parse_1_1SWIG_10 () from /tmp/crfpp-java-0.57-fcac54dc-13d1-48a4-b76d-b2941f15da0d-libCRFPP.so ###2、定位dump的细节 objdump -Cd /export/servers/model/crf/so_lib/libCRFPP.so > tt.txt cat tt.txt|grep "forwardbackward" [root@ckespam-e31e7701-2927318961-21969 App]# cat tt.txt|grep "forwardbackward" 0000000000010848 <CRFPP::TaggerImpl::forwardbackward()@plt>: 0000000000027f40 <CRFPP::TaggerImpl::forwardbackward()>: 27f5a: 0f 84 98 01 00 00 je 280f8 <CRFPP::TaggerImpl::forwardbackward()+0x1b8> 27f7a: 7e 65 jle
